resource.string: The strong will always beat the weak.| It is the way of the world, and the will of the gods!
Many men wish to be remembered, to change the world and leave some sign of greatness. |But only the strongest can seize immortality!
Some men are born to lead. |Others are destined to kneel before their masters!
"The young replace their elders. It is the way of things. |Teeth, swords or lies: all are the weapons of rebellion."""
Men yearn to be remembered, and to leave their mark on Rome and her people. |Few have the will needed!
Breaking a man is easy; breaking his spirit less so. |Even kept in darkness a man may look to break his bonds and seek revenge.
Chaining a beast does not break a beast. |Look into its eyes. The spark is there. |It is biding its time. Waiting for the moment to strikeâ€¦
Some men are destined to lead. |Others must kneel before their betters!
The gods have spoken. Only the strong will rule. |The weak are forgotten.
Men yearn to be remembered, to leave behind more than dust on the desert wind. |But only the strongest gain immortality!
Chain a man. Kill his kin. He is not conquered. |Blood demands blood and, eventually, debts will be settled!
Men yearn to be remembered,to make a mark on the world and rival the gods. |Only the strong achieve immortality!
